name: xernerx-extension-builder
description: A builder for extensions of the xernerx framework.
author: Dummi

scripts.start: npm i && npm audit fix --force && npm fund && npm link && tsc -w
scripts.patch: npm run build && git add . && npm run commit && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor: npm run build && git add . && npm run commit && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.major: npm run build && git add . && npm run commit && npm version major && npm publish && git push
scripts.build: tsc && npx tsup src/main.ts && npx prettier --write src
